magichem:rituals/reagent_2_crafting: Ritual of the Rod and Circle
feedback.ritual.alchemical_infusion.nove: This ritual requires Materia Vessels in very specific locations. Make sure there's a Materia Vessel with the proper type of materia in the "crook" of the scale pattern on both sides.
tooltip.magichem.powerspike: Transfers energy from a Circle of Power.
tooltip.magichem.materiajar: Stores a small amount of Materia.
tooltip.magichem.materiavessel: Stores a very large amount of Materia. A Vessel bearing Essentia will automatically display a label.
tooltip.magichem.alembic: Breaks down blocks and items into their component Materia. Requires a heat source underneath.
tooltip.magichem.distillery: Breaks down blocks and items into their component Materia. Requires a heat source underneath.
tooltip.magichem.centrifuge: Breaks down Admixtures into their component Materia.
tooltip.magichem.actuator.water: A Water-aspected Elemental Actuator. Increases the Efficiency of a connected device. Consumes water every time the connected device completes an operation.
tooltip.magichem.actuator.fire: A Fire-aspected Elemental Actuator. Continuously operates a connected device. Reduces FE requirement of powered devices, reduces operation time of non-powered devices.
tooltip.magichem.actuator.earth: An Earth-aspected Elemental Actuator. Reduces and manages Grime buildup. Consumes sand every time the connected device completes an operation.
tooltip.magichem.actuator.air: An Air-aspected Elemental Actuator. Slows down operation time, but allows a connected device to process more than one item at once.
tooltip.magichem.experienceexchanger: Place on top of a Brimming Urn. Transfers Academic Slurry to and from a Crystal of Memories.
tooltip.magichem.circlefabrication: Uses Materia and FE to create a wide variety of items and blocks.
tooltip.magichem.irisargenti: Used to create complex alchemical paraphernalia.
tooltip.magichem.alchemicalwaste: A mistake, or perhaps a failure. It smells unbelievably foul.
tooltip.magichem.alchemicalwaste.ext: Created by breaking devices without extracting materia first.
tooltip.magichem.rarefiedwaste: Something glitters within, though the smell is no less foul.
tooltip.magichem.rarefiedwaste.ext: Can be Distilled into random Admixtures.
tooltip.magichem.cleaningbrush: Used to clean the Grime out of alchemical devices.
tooltip.magichem.magiccircle: The heart of a device that uses an alchemical circle.
tooltip.magichem.gasbucket: A simple spell spoken over this bucket keeps the vapor inside from escaping.
tooltip.magichem.sublimationprimer: Used to select a recipe for the Ritual of the Balanced Scales.
tooltip.magichem.circlepower: Uses mystical reagents to generate energy.
tooltip.magichem.wasteproduct: A waste product created by the Circle of Power.
tooltip.magichem.wasteproduct.reprocess: Can be reprocessed into a usable reagent.
tooltip.magichem.silvergrains: The first-order reagent for the Circle of Power.
tooltip.magichem.focusingcatalyst: The second-order reagent for the Circle of Power.
tooltip.magichem.catalystcore: The pulsing heart of a Focusing Catalyst.
tooltip.magichem.catalystcore.damaged: It's twisted, damaged, and unusable in this state.
tooltip.magichem.catalystcasing: The peeled and damaged shell of a Focusing Catalyst.
tooltip.magichem.catalystcasing.reproces: It could be applied to a working Catalyst Core.
tooltip.magichem.antessence: A Stranger of no House or Wheel
tooltip.magichem.nulla: A Stranger of no House or Wheel
tooltip.magichem.quintessence: A Stranger of no House or Wheel
tooltip.magichem.ender: First of the House of Elements
tooltip.magichem.earth: Second of the House of Elements
tooltip.magichem.water: Third of the House of Elements
tooltip.magichem.air: Fourth of the House of Elements
tooltip.magichem.fire: Fifth of the House of Elements
tooltip.magichem.arcane: Last of the House of Elements
tooltip.magichem.conceptual: First of the House of Qualities
tooltip.magichem.verdant: Second of the House of Qualities
tooltip.magichem.fleshy: Third of the House of Qualities
tooltip.magichem.nourishing: Fourth of the House of Qualities
tooltip.magichem.rotten: Fifth of the House of Qualities
tooltip.magichem.mineral: Sixth of the House of Qualities
tooltip.magichem.wrought: Seventh of the House of Qualities
tooltip.magichem.precious: Last of the House of Qualities
tooltip.magichem.nigredo: First of the House of Alchemy
tooltip.magichem.albedo: Second of the House of Alchemy
tooltip.magichem.citrinitas: Third of the House of Alchemy
tooltip.magichem.rubedo: Last of the House of Alchemy
tooltip.magichem.gui.efficiency.line1: The chance that each dram of materia will successfully process.
tooltip.magichem.gui.efficiency.line2: Each dram has its own Efficiency check. Failure to process generates additional Grime.
tooltip.magichem.gui.operationtime.line1: The amount of time, in seconds, it takes to perform one task in this device.
tooltip.magichem.gui.grime.line1: How much waste and residue has built up in this device.
tooltip.magichem.gui.grime.line2.2: , the device's Efficiency drops and its Operation Time increases.
tooltip.magichem.gui.slurry.tank.line1: How much Academic Slurry is stored inside the
tooltip.magichem.gui.slurry.tank.line2a: Academic Slurry is consumed with each successful Fixation. If Fixation fails, the Academic Slurry cost is reduced by
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.efficiency: How much the connected device's Efficiency is increased by when the Deluge Purifier is active.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.eldrin.lin: How much appropriate Eldrin power is consumed during each processing cycle.
The device draws Eldrin power every
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.energyusag: How much the connected device's FE cost per second is adjusted by.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.operationt: How much the connected device's time to complete one operation is adjusted by.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.fuelburn.l: How much time the currently inserted piece of fuel will burn for.
Fuel is optional, but improves the effectiveness of the Inferno Engine.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.smokegen.l: How much Smoke is produced every time the linked device completes an operation.
When the Inferno Engine's reservoir is full, no additional Smoke will be produced.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.waterconsu: How much Water is consumed every time the Deluge Purifier draws Eldrin power.
If there is insufficient water in the Deluge Purifier's tank, it will not function even if there is sufficient Eldrin power.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.steamgen.l: How much Steam is produced every time the linked device completes an operation.
When the Deluge Purifier's reservoir is full, no additional Steam will be produced.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.sandconsum: How much Sand is consumed every time the Quake Refinery absorbs Grime from the targeted device.
If there is insufficient sand in the Quake Refinery's tank, it will not function even if there is sufficient Eldrin power. Grime will remain in the linked device's buffer instead.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.grimereduc: How much the Grime absorbed from the linked device is reduced by.
of the reduced Grime becomes Rarefied Waste instead of Alchemical Waste.
How many items the linked device will process at once.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.gasconsume: How much Smoke and/or Steam is consumed every time the linked device completes an operation.
At this power level, no Steam or Smoke is required.
At this power level, either Steam or Smoke must be provided. The cost will be paid from whichever tank is most full.
At this power level, both Steam and Smoke must be provided. The cost will be paid from both tanks simultaneously.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.fire.power: Increasing this value will boost the Inferno Engine's effectiveness, but also increase the amount of Fire Eldrin Power consumed each operation cycle.
How much smoke is currently stored inside of the Inferno Engine.
of smoke is created every time the linked device completes an operation. Excess smoke is vented out of the device.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.water.powe: Increasing this value will boost the Deluge Purifier's effectiveness, but also increase the amount of water and Water Eldrin Power consumed each operation cycle.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.water.tank: How much water is currently stored inside of the Deluge Purifier.
of water is used every operation cycle.
How much steam is currently stored inside of the Deluge Purifier.
of steam is created every time the linked device completes an operation. Excess steam is vented out of the device.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.earth.powe: Increasing this value will boost the Quake Refinery's effectiveness, but also increase the amount of sand and Earth Eldrin Power consumed each operation cycle.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.earth.tank: How much Grime is currently stored inside of the Quake Refinery.
Grime is redirected from the targeted device and stored inside the Quake Refinery. Alchemical Waste and Rarefied Waste can be extracted from the slots to the right, cleaning is not necessary.
How much sand is currently stored inside of the Quake Refinery.
of sand is used every operation cycle.
tooltip.magichem.gui.actuator.air.powerl: Increasing this value will boost the Gale Pressurizer's effectiveness, but also increase the amount of Air Eldrin Power consumed each operation cycle and make the device require Smoke and/or Steam.
How much smoke is currently stored inside of the Gale Pressurizer. Smoke is created as a byproduct in the Inferno Engine.
of smoke is used every operation cycle.
How much steam is currently stored inside of the Gale Pressurizer.
of steam is used every operation cycle.
log.magichem.powerspike.nosource: This Power Spike has not been bound to a Circle of Power. It will not transfer any FE.
log.magichem.powerspike.bind: Power Spike bound to this Circle of Power.
gui.mna.parameter.clean_alchemical_appar: What alchemical device should the construct clean using water in its tank?
gui.mna.parameter.sort_materia.point: What alchemical device should the construct remove materia from?
gui.mna.parameter.sort_materia.area: What area should the construct look for Materia Vessels inside of?
gui.mna.parameter.sort_materia.boolean: Should the construct void excess materia that won't fit inside of a Materia Vessel?
gui.mna.parameter.query_check_vessel.poi: What Materia Vessel should the construct look at?
gui.mna.parameter.query_check_vessel.int: What percentage full must the Materia Vessel be?
What device should the construct check the grime level of?
What percentage full of grime must the device be?
gui.mna.parameter.collect_experience.are: What area should the construct look for experience orbs within?
gui.mna.parameter.study.point: Where is the Study Desk that the construct should study at?
